mapper.select: select t.id,t.cust_code custCode,t.cust_name custName,sum(t1.contract_amount) amount from t_pss_customer t left join t_pss_contract_sale t1 on t.cust_code = t1.part_a group by t.id,t.cust_code,t.cust_name order by sum(t1.contract_amount) desc

SELECT t.material_code materialCode, t1.material_name materialName, IFNULL(sum(t.quantity * t.price_tax),0) amount, ( SELECT IFNULL(sum(quantity * price_tax), 0) FROM t_pss_material_detail x WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_pss_contract_sale y WHERE x.foreign_code = y.contract_code ) ) totalSales FROM t_pss_material_detail_log t INNER JOIN t_pss_order t2 ON t.foreign_code = t2.order_code and t2.order_type ='1' and t2.`status` > 2 and t2.`status` != '4' LEFT JOIN t_pss_material_mgt t1 ON t.material_code = t1.material_code GROUP BY t.material_code, t1.material_name order by IFNULL(sum(t.quantity * t.price_tax),0) desc LIMIT 4

select A.top6month,IFNULL(B.amount,0) amount from ( SELECT date_format(@lastDay := last_day( date_add(@lastDay,interval 1 month ) ) ,'%Y-%m' ) top6month from (SELECT @lastDay := date_add(curdate(),interval -6 month) from mysql.help_topic limit 6) t ) A left join (select left(t.signing_date,7) months,sum(contract_amount) amount from t_pss_contract_sale t where t.contract_status = '4' group by left(t.signing_date,7)) B on A.top6month = B.months
order by A.top6month asc

select t.order_send_code orderSendCode,t.send_time sendTime,t2.supplier_name supplierName,t3.note as sendStatusName from t_pss_order_send t left join t_pss_order t1 on t.order_code = t1.order_code left join t_pss_supplier t2 on t1.supplier_code = t2.supplier_code left join t_pss_dict t3 on t.send_status = t3.code and t3.type = 'shzt' where t.send_status = '1' order by t.id desc limit 20

select t.material_code materialCode,t2.material_name materialName,sum(t.send_quantity) sendQuantity from t_pss_material_detail_send t left join t_pss_material_mgt t2 on t.material_code = t2.material_code where exists (select 1 from t_pss_order_send t1 where t.foreign_code = t1.order_send_code and t1.order_code in (select order_code from t_pss_order where order_type ='1' and STATUS= '7') ) and t2.measure_unit = '吨' group by t.material_code,t2.material_name order by sum(t.send_quantity) DESC limit 5

select t.cust_name custName,t.addr,t.type,t1.note typeName,t.contracts,t.contract_tel contractTel,t.latitude,t.longitude, IFNULL(t2.amount,0) amount from t_pss_customer t left join t_pss_dict_tree t1 on t.type = t1.code and t1.type ='KHLX' left join (select part_a,sum(contract_amount) amount from t_pss_contract_sale where contract_status ='4' group by part_a) t2 on t.cust_code = t2.part_a where 1=1 and t.addr like '%恩施%'
select t.type,t1.note typeName,count(t.supplier_code) count from t_pss_supplier t left join t_pss_dict_tree t1 on t.type = t1.`code` and t1.type ='GYSLX' group by t.type,t1.note
